attributes.additional_details: I have already involved our local MP Conor Burns. It’s an ongoing problem fast cars and another accident last night! Next time it could be a child. Hopefully parliament can action this sooner rather than later unlike BCP council.
attributes.background: To have traffic calming measures in place on the road of Moore Avenue Bh11 8as. Another accident last night

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
